underlying_goal: Design a migration strategy to consolidate hmmall goods and GMS item_options into a unified product table, then use that as the basis for OMS product table design, with the end goal of all products flowing through OMS to GMS
friction_detail: Claude repeatedly proposed abstract adapter/port patterns (Strangler Fig, Product Port) when user wanted a concrete field-inventory-first approach; also misunderstood DB access topology and the final data flow direction (hmmall → OMS → GMS) requiring multiple corrections.
brief_summary: User wanted to brainstorm a migration strategy for consolidating hmmall/GMS product tables into a unified schema for OMS integration; Claude provided structured analysis but repeatedly misunderstood the user's preferred concrete approach, requiring several corrections before aligning.
